comments:
When adding an IBM Tape CIMOM 1.3.0.x (GA Release) the GUI returns failed with error UNKNOWN.

dmSvcTrace.log shows sblimCIMClient Exception:
Caused by: org.sblim.wbem.cim.CIMException: CIM_ERR_FAILED; nested exception is: 
	java.io.IOException: Underlying input stream returned zero bytes
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.<init>(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:141)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClientXML.getEnumeration(CIMClientXML.java:1637)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClientXML.enumerateClassNames(CIMClientXML.java:993)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClient.enumerateClassNames(CIMClient.java:2999)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClient.enumerateClassNames(CIMClient.java:2954)
	... 5 more
Caused by: java.io.IOException: Underlying input stream returned zero bytes
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder$CharsetSD.readBytes(Unknown Source)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder$CharsetSD.implRead(Unknown Source)
	at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(Unknown Source)
	at java.io.InputStreamReader.read(Unknown Source)
	at org.sblim.wbem.xml.parser.XMLPullParser.getChar(XMLPullParser.java:805)
	at org.sblim.wbem.xml.parser.XMLPullParser.getNextCharCheckingEOF(XMLPullParser.java:833)
	at org.sblim.wbem.xml.parser.XMLPullParser.next(XMLPullParser.java:604)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.next(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:362)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.<init>(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:119)
	... 9 more   org.eclipse.aperi.disk.common.CIMOMManager testOneCIMOMConnection


With backlevel sblimCIMClient or other CIM tools accessing the Tape CIMOM is not a problem.

Opened defect for sblimCIMClient at sourceforge.net:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1682031&group_id=128809&atid=712784
Aperi 0.3.1 and later contains the latest sblimCIMClient version.

traces.message: Underlying input stream returned zero bytes

causedBy.message: Underlying input stream returned zero bytes
